description: T16 - Cypress - fell - declining health over a number of monthsT67 - Robinia - lift canopy to 4m over road - canopy hanging low over road - lift to clear passing vehicles T69 - Oak - lift canopy to 4m over road - canopy hanging low over road - lift to clear passing vehicles T70 - Oak - raise canopy up to 4m over road - canopy hanging low over road - lift to clear passing vehicles.  T98 - Group of Spindles, Elder and Prunus - remove dead Spindle and Elder that is blocking light to neighbour T99 - Hornbeam - tip reduce by 0.5m overall to leave finished height and spread of 3.5m.  This will allow light into neighbours' property T133 - Hawthorn - reduce canopy overall by 1m to leave finished height of 3mT172 - Liquidambar - raise canopy by 2.4m - lift to allow clearance over footpathT190 - Parottia - tip prune to clear path - canopy hanging low over path - lift to allow clearance over footpathT191 - Holm Oak - prune height to previous pruning points to leave finished height of 3mT200 - Liquidambar - fell - tree is deadT225 - Holly - reduce by 1m to leave finished height of 3m - tree is becoming tall and leggy and invading canopy of adjacent SycamoreT233 - Juvenile Silver Birch - fell - tree is deadT235 - Juvenile Silver Birch - fell - tree is deadT237 - Crab Apple - fell - tree is deadB - Privately owned Cherry - raise canopy by 4m over road - canopy hanging low over road and touching vehicles
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
